title: Alex Mitchell – Medium
description: Collected the Complete Short Stories of F. Scott Fitzgerald. Edits the Feminist Friday newsletter. Also I’m a data analyst.

title: Amy Smith Literature
description: Teaching and studying English Literature and Language at Key Stages 3, 4, and 5.

title: Ana Ulin · Blog
description: This is a grab bag of annotations accrued over the many years this site has existed.

title: Anecdotal Evidence
description: A blog about the intersection of books and life.

title: The Bibliophilic Blogger
description: "A precondition for reading good books is not reading bad ones: for life is short" - Schopenhauer.

title: Bloom | "Late" According to Whom?
description: Where you’ll encounter authors whose first books were published when they were 40 or older; who bloomed in their own good time.

title: Blue Labyrinths
description: An online magazine focusing on literature, philosophy, and a collection of interesting ideas.

title: The Book Haven
description: Cynthia L. Haven's blog for the written word.

title: Book Jotter
description: Reviews, news, features and all things books for passionate readers.

title: The Captive Reader
description: 20th Century middlebrow fiction, domestic Victorian novels, volumes of correspondence, gossipy diaries, books about European history, and almost anything having to do with Jane Austen.

title: Chapati Mystery
description: a "quaint blog" established in April 2004. It focuses on histories and cultures of Hindustan.

title: Clothes In Books
description: Description of clothes taken from a book, a picture suggested by (rather than illustrative of) the words, plus some observations.

title: A Common Reader
description: A way to sort through my thoughts about what I read and organize my notes. I hope it can provide readers a resource for classics, hard-to-find books, and non-fiction works.

title: The Dusty Bookcase
description: A journey through Canada's forgotten, neglected and suppressed writing.
